description: The apparent faux pas was shown in the live broadcast of Putin’s visit by North Korean state media.
title: Putin's Ministers Ejected From N. Korean Negotiation Room for Entering Before Kim Jong Un

description: Ukraine's military said the Russian armed forces "launched five assault operations at once" near the town of Toretsk.
title: Russian Forces Intensify Assault on Ukrainian Frontline Town

description: “Paris is provoking another round of armed confrontation in the South Caucasus, and they are doing it in different ways,” Moscow said.
title: Russia Accuses France of Risking War in South Caucasus After Armenian Arms Deal

description:
Russian President Vladimir Putin was greeted by cheering crowds during a state visit to Pyongyang on Wednesday, marking what North Korea’s Kim Jong Un called a “new era” in relations between the historic allies.

The visit to North Korea, Putin’s first since 2000, comes nine months after Russia hosted Kim on a visit to the Far East. Ties between the two countries have strengthened since Moscow launched its full-scale invasion of Ukraine in 2022.

Western countries have accused North Korea of supplying Russia with much-needed arms for use on the battlefield in Ukraine. In an article published by North Korean state media, Putin praised the isolated country for “firmly supporting” the invasion. 

Here’s how Pyongyang greeted the Russian president:
title: In Photos: North Korea Rolls Out the Red Carpet for Vladimir Putin

description: Boris Nadezhdin said his decision to step down from the Dolgoprudny city council was not made under pressure from external actors.
title: Ex-Presidential Hopeful Nadezhdin Resigns as Municipal Deputy

description: The pledge of military cooperation was part of a strategic treaty signed at a summit in Pyongyang, where Putin was making his first visit in 24 years.
title: Russia, North Korea Sign Mutual Defense Deal as Kim Pledges Support for Ukraine Invasion

description: The new sanctions target individuals involved in the poisoning of Navalny in 2020, as well as his arrest and imprisonment after returning to Russia.
title: Canada Sanctions 13 Russian Officials Over Navalny’s Death

description: Medvedev fled to Norway in January 2023 after deserted from the front line in eastern Ukraine, where he fought as a mercenary for the Wagner.
title: Norway Jails Ex-Wagner Commander for Beating Woman, Attacking Bartender

description: "The ball is in the court of the United States," Deputy Foreign Minister Sergei Ryabkov told state media.
title: Moscow Says Awaits U.S. Response to Prisoner Swap Proposals

description: U.S. army soldier Gordon Black's lawyer intends to appeal the verdict, state media reported.
title: Russian Court Jails American Soldier for Theft, Death Threats
